title: Do people who post "Riot please change X" threads think they will get what they want?
body: I see so many of them I don't know why one would think it would be obvious that Riot doesn't make game changes based on one players opinion.

replies.body:
tbh they just want to know they are being heard.  
If a champion was blatantly OP for months and Riot gave no word on it the entire time, that'd be pretty frustrating now wouldnt it?

Its a community who gets things changed, not 1 single man but without that 1 man to stand up and start the conversation nothing gets said. This has been proven throughout history in life not just a game

I dont think any player thinks that their input alone will convince riot to change the game, i think its more about raising awareness about the issue.

if no one ever said anything then how would riot know what people wanted to change?
